name: Mahjong - Tournament Games
description:
Mahjong Tournament lets you unleash your skills and compete with real opponents to win real cash prizes! With stunning graphics and fantastic 3D effects, this is the worldwide e-sport tournament sensation Mahjong players have been waiting for!

Compete for real prizes or play for fun, completely free, with the best Mahjong game on mobile!

Powered by Skillz: E-Sports for Everyone.
